node.title: Guiding Principles
node.excerpt:
We ground our work in a fairly simple ethos.  We've tried to lay them out here.
 This articulation might change over time, but our animating principles should
remain consistent.

 * Never build anything alone
 * Flexible beats prescient
 * Open wins from the bottom up

Our ethos echo the Bedrock Principles of the wider Unfinished ecosystem.  We
look forward to the Unfinished team rolling out those bedrocks into public view.
 For now, we'll just note that we align with their grounding in connecti
node.plaintext:
We ground our work in a fairly simple ethos.  We've tried to lay them out here.
 This articulation might change over time, but our animating principles should
remain consistent.

 * Never build anything alone
 * Flexible beats prescient
 * Open wins from the bottom up

Our ethos echo the Bedrock Principles of the wider Unfinished ecosystem.  We
look forward to the Unfinished team rolling out those bedrocks into public view.
 For now, we'll just note that we align with their grounding in connection,
vision, and collaboration.
node.html:
We ground our work in a fairly simple ethos.  We've tried to lay them out here.  This articulation might change over time, but our animating principles should remain consistent.

  • Never build anything alone
  • Flexible beats prescient
  • Open wins from the bottom up

Our ethos echo the Bedrock Principles of the wider Unfinished ecosystem.  We look forward to the Unfinished team rolling out those bedrocks into public view.  For now, we'll just note that we align with their grounding in connection, vision, and collaboration.
